name: Scatterbraiiin
description:
This is a zombie survival game where you have to survive for 10 days. During the day, you can find, explore and look for coins, buy upgrades and heal to prepare for the next day. During the night you have to fend off zombies and try to survive with your blaster.

Controls

  • WASD or Arrow Keys: Movement
  • Shift(L/R): Sprint
  • Space: Jump
  • Left Mouse Button: Shoot
  • Q: Shop   
  • E: Interact 
  • Escape/P: Pause
